content.description: Sit Start.  Small Overhang place 1-2 pads.  Left hand on the obvious side pull.  RIght hand opposite on corner judge.  High Heel on the circular pormation.  Pull into the start with left foot flagged under the boulder.  Right Hand bump to rail above left hand.  Match both hands on the rail.  Reach right hand to a very nice 2 finger pocket.  Reposition and bump right hand to a really nice prominant finger pinch. Pull into pinch adjust heel to toe.  Cut feet and bring left toe onto the rail just to the left of your left hand.  left hand to a nice multi finger hold and work through the top out.
content.location: Directly on the face of the boulder lowest flake is the start.

content.description: Foot pedestal is off! Start on a big jug on the right side of the face and make your way straight up on some nice crimps. Suffers from being too short.
content.location: Right side of the trailside boulder.

content.description: The pedestal is off! Two hand start on the obvious large hold on the left side of the trailside boudler. Get creative with your feet to establish for the start and find a way to make your way up and then left on good holds.
content.location: Left side of the trailside boulder.

content.description: Two boulders next to Alberton rock. No ticks on here and not sure about elsewhere so please add/update if you have any information.
